A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Luke was a major disappointment.  The most hopeful guy in the galaxy-that saved one of the worst humans to ever live\, because he saw the good in him-can't see the good in himself.  He's in a deeply depressed stupor.  It is clear that the original heroes were only in this trilogy to bring the old fans along.
